snippet.title: PC Longplay [239] Ripper (Part 1 of 2)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by Aero

Jack's back. In 2040, a vicious serial killer stalks the mean streets of New York, eviscerating his victims and vanishing without a trace. The police are baffled, the city paralyzed with fear. Only you, as crime reporter Jack Quinlan, can crack the case. 

Ripper is not too bad for an fmv game.The story is okay, the overall atmosphere pretty good, plus the game features well known actors like John Rhys-Davies, Burgess Meredith and Christopher Walken.

The only parts I didn't like were the cyberspace well puzzles as they take a lot of time and are completely boring. For the chess puzzle, I even couldn't find out how to solve it, so I used a hint from a walkthrough to just bypass it.

There are four possible suspects, that can be the ripper. It is Falconetti in this longplay. I also added the bad end (wrong suspect killed) to the end of this video. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
